segment.source: Enterprise security guides (Windows 10)
segment.target: Enterprise security guides (Windows 10)

segment.source: Get proven guidance to help you better secure and protect your enterprise by using technologies such as Credential Guard, Device Guard, Microsoft Passport, and Windows Hello.
segment.target: Get proven guidance to help you better secure and protect your enterprise by using technologies such as Credential Guard, Device Guard, Microsoft Passport, and Windows Hello.

segment.source: This section offers technology overviews and step-by-step guides.
segment.target: This section offers technology overviews and step-by-step guides.

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Control the health of Windows 10-based devices
segment.target: Control the health of Windows 10-based devices

segment.source: This article details an end-to-end solution that helps you protect high-value assets by enforcing, controlling, and reporting the health of Windows 10-based devices.
segment.target: This article details an end-to-end solution that helps you protect high-value assets by enforcing, controlling, and reporting the health of Windows 10-based devices.

segment.source: Device Guard deployment guide
segment.target: Device Guard deployment guide

segment.source: Microsoft Device Guard is a feature set that consists of both hardware and software system integrity hardening features that revolutionize the Windows operating system’s security.
segment.target: Microsoft Device Guard is a feature set that consists of both hardware and software system integrity hardening features that revolutionize the Windows operating system’s security.

segment.source: Windows 10 employs Device Guard as well as code integrity and advanced hardware features such as CPU virtualization extensions, Trusted Platform Module, and second-level address translation to offer comprehensive modern security to its users.
segment.target: Windows 10 employs Device Guard as well as code integrity and advanced hardware features such as CPU virtualization extensions, Trusted Platform Module, and second-level address translation to offer comprehensive modern security to its users.

segment.source: This guide explores the individual features in Device Guard as well as how to plan for, configure, and deploy them.
segment.target: This guide explores the individual features in Device Guard as well as how to plan for, configure, and deploy them.

segment.source: Microsoft Passport guide
segment.target: Microsoft Passport guide

segment.source: This guide describes the new Windows Hello and Microsoft Passport technologies that are part of the Windows 10 operating system.
segment.target: This guide describes the new Windows Hello and Microsoft Passport technologies that are part of the Windows 10 operating system.

segment.source: It highlights specific capabilities of these technologies that help mitigate threats from conventional credentials and provides guidance about how to design and deploy these technologies as part of your Windows 10 rollout.
segment.target: It highlights specific capabilities of these technologies that help mitigate threats from conventional credentials and provides guidance about how to design and deploy these technologies as part of your Windows 10 rollout.

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile security guide
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile security guide

segment.source: This guide provides a detailed description of the most important security features in the Windows 10 Mobile operating system—identity access and control, data protection, malware resistance, and app platform security.
segment.target: This guide provides a detailed description of the most important security features in the Windows 10 Mobile operating system—identity access and control, data protection, malware resistance, and app platform security.

segment.source: Windows 10 security overview
segment.target: Windows 10 security overview

segment.source: This guide provides a detailed description of the most important security improvements in the Windows 10 operating system, with links to more detailed articles about many of its security features.
segment.target: This guide provides a detailed description of the most important security improvements in the Windows 10 operating system, with links to more detailed articles about many of its security features.

segment.source: Wherever possible, specific recommendations are provided to help you implement and configure Windows 10 security features.
segment.target: Wherever possible, specific recommendations are provided to help you implement and configure Windows 10 security features.
